title: My New Channel - EnderRealms

embed.description: In this game, I play as sona... I main sona supp... but sona in ARAM is ALLOT different :/ Disclaimer: Music: Intro: Yu Yevon Battle Theme - Composed by Nobuo Uematsu for...

body:
Hello Everyone, I just would like you all to help me make my new YouTube channel, I've been wanting to make a channel for years now, and finally muscled up the strength (and time) to make a channel..

I am making this post for 2 reasons, to get a larger viewer count, and for more feedback other close friends.

I'll try to upload from 1-3 times a week. but no promises...

replies.body: I think you need to provide some kind of commentary or else it becomes a bit boring. I would also suggest not just uploading the whole game just highlights

The Recording software i use doesn't agree with my current Microphone, so i can't really do Commentary atm. And I can't really upload the Highlights I don't have much money so i'm using the Windows Movie Maker.

Audacity is a free software you can use for the Commentary
http://audacity.sourceforge.net/

Anddddd, I think investing in a good microphone is worth it if you're going to really work hard on your Channel
http://www.bluemic.com/
Thankyou for the Links, i've downloaded Audacity, I've adjusted it so that all the background noise is cut, such as my fan... It's very hot here in Australia :(
You could just download some free software and record over the top it would be more hassle but worth it if you are serious.

Hey Faelaren, what do you think of my Channel, Im kinda trying to make a League Channel that extremely Random sooooo, if you guys could take a look that would be highly appreciated :)

https://www.youtube.com/user/xsircution
New Vid I just posted a few seconds ago: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2WPDMS8IjG8

I already commented on your post haha. 

I think the ones you talk in make it 10 times better. Or else I just get bored and click to the next one without watching it through.
Dammm, how do you play on like 15 fps

I have a pretty bad computer, 4GB ram, low quality GPU, 500GB HHD and a Quad-core 2GHz CPU.

Not to mention that my HHD has like 30GB space left...

As soon as i get more money, i may Build a custom PC with the majority of the money on the RAM, GPU and HHD

And in all honesty, I don't really care the FPS, as long as the Framerate stays above 12, i find the game, and any game infact, quite playable.

If I was you I would do something like
120GB SSD
1TB HDD
8GB RAM 
Quad 3.6ghz
GPU is really up to you

:)
